scripts.test: npm run test:startdb; TEST_ENV=true AWS_REGION=us-west-2 AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=AKID AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=SECRET LIGHTRAIL_DOMAIN=api.lightrail.local LIGHTRAIL_EMAIL_DOMAIN=lightrail.local LIGHTRAIL_WEBAPP_DOMAIN=lightrail.local TEAM_MEMBER_TABLE=TeamMember TOKEN_ACTION_TABLE=TokenAction USER_TABLE=User mocha --recursive --throw-deprecation --require ts-node/register --require ./src/utils/testUtils/setLogLevelSilent.ts --exit "src/**/*.test.ts"; npm run test:stopdb
scripts.test:debug: npm run test:startdb; TEST_ENV=true AWS_REGION=us-west-2 AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=AKID AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=SECRET LIGHTRAIL_DOMAIN=api.lightrail.local LIGHTRAIL_EMAIL_DOMAIN=lightrail.local LIGHTRAIL_WEBAPP_DOMAIN=lightrail.local TEAM_MEMBER_TABLE=TeamMember TOKEN_ACTION_TABLE=TokenAction USER_TABLE=User mocha --recursive --throw-deprecation --require ts-node/register --require ./src/utils/testUtils/setLogLevelDebug.ts --exit "src/**/*.test.ts"; npm run test:stopdb
scripts.test:startdb: docker start edhi-test || (docker run --name edhi-test -p 8000:8000 amazon/dynamodb-local)
